text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded Metrics Performance>
We are investigating delays in forming contact trace records, and degraded service for the metrics and call recording UI in the US-EAST-1 Region. Call handling is not affected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Degraded Metrics Performance>
We continue to investigate delays in forming contact trace records, and degraded performance of the metrics and call recording search experience in the US-EAST-1 region. Call handling is not affected.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Degraded Metrics Performance>
Between 9:50 AM and 11:40 AM PDT, we experienced delays in forming contact trace records, and degraded performance of the metrics and call recording search experience in the US-EAST-1 Region. No metrics or call recordings were lost, and call handling was not affected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
